text: Neurological speech impairment 7.5% Reduced consciousness/confusion 7.5% Scoliosis 7.5% Tremor 7.5% Babinski sign 5% Cerebellar atrophy 5% Dysmetria 5% Lower limb hyperreflexia 5% Nystagmus 5% Sensorineural hearing impairment 5% Achilles tendon contracture - Axonal degeneration - Decreased motor nerve conduction velocity - Decreased number of peripheral myelinated nerve fibers - Difficulty walking - Distal amyotrophy - Distal muscle weakness - Distal sensory impairment - Dysarthria - Dysphagia
